svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/28.2.5 Chrome/138.0.7204.251 Electron/37.6.1 Safari/537.36" version="28.2.5"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="OhKnBKOZqt_UgJkgxveS"> <mxGraphModel dx="1917" dy="993" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-1" value="Follower" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="160" width="120" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-2" value="Candidate" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="520" width="120" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-3" value="Follower" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="520" width="120" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-4" value="Candidate" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="160" width="120" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-5" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">初始</h1><p>1. RAFT 任意节点都要有所有节点的地址配置用于发起投票（vote）</p><p>2. 每个节点启动后都会有个随机的延迟时间，在此时间内，如果其他节点抢先变成 Candidate 并发出 RequestVote 来到该节点要票（根据判定条件决定），给票了那么该节点就不会转变成 Candidate 。反之没有其他节点发出的 RequestVote 通过则该节点变成 Candidate 并向配置里的所有节点发 RequestVote 要票。</p><p>3. 当某个 Candidate 得到过半的选票后会直接宣布自己当选并向其他节点发送 AppendEntries ，此时如果 Candidate 如果收到 AppendEntries 就会转变成 Follower 而停止选举。</p><p>4. 当集群是偶数个节点，且节点被2个Candidate均分时会导致都不能获取过半投票而重新发起选举。或者更糟糕的情况，出现多个 Candidate 并都不能获取过半票数也是要重新发起选举。</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-320" y="160" width="320" height="440" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=1;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-4" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-3"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="380" y="380" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="430" y="330" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-9" value="1. 要票" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-6"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0436" y="2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-7" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-2" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-3"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="450" y="340" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="500" y="290" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-12" value="3.要票" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-7"> <mxGeometry x="0.0327" y="3" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-8" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-2" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="200" y="340" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="250" y="290" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-16" value="5.要票" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-8"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0763" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-10" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.658;entryY=0.992;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.667;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-3" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="450" y="340" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="500" y="290" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-11" value="2.投票" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-10"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0327" y="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-13" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.65;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.975;entryY=0.667;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-3" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-2"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="450" y="340" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="170" y="550" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-14" value="4.不给，已投其他" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-13"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0109" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-15" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.35;entryY=0.008;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0.35;exitY=0.967;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-1" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-2"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="240" y="360" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="290" y="310" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-18" value="6.投票" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-15"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0122" y="-3" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-19" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-2" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="310" y="420" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="360" y="370" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-20" value="7.要票" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-19"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0142" y="4" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-21" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.7;entryY=0.033;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0.017;exitY=0.692;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-4" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-2"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="320" y="190" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="370" y="140" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-22" value="8.不给，投自己" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-21"> <mxGeometry x="0.014" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-23" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.975;entryY=0.308;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0.042;exitY=0.292;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-4" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="460" y="340" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="510" y="290" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-25" value="9.要票" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-23"> <mxGeometry x="0.0834" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-26" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1.008;exitY=0.442;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.025;entryY=0.392;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-1" target="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="593" y="340" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="310" y="342" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-27" value="10.不给，已投其他" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-26"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0109" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-28" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">RequestVote 判断条件</h1><p>&nbsp;1. Candidate 的日志必须不比 Follower 旧。</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-320" y="600" width="360" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tYKhJ4kLz6sBy4ukgJdD-29" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">术语</h1><p>Leader: 主节点，可以读写。</p><p>Follower：从节点，只能读。</p><p>Candidate: 候选人，选举阶段的候选节点。</p><p>RequestVote RPC: Candidate 向其他节点发送要票的请求。</p><p>AppendEntries RPC: Leader 向其他节点发送的心跳，超时就会被 Follower 认为失职而进入投票阶段。</p><p>Term：任期，每次从投票开始到选出 Leader 并在 Leader 不能正常工作前的整个时期。</p><p>Log: 日志，数据同步依靠传递日志，选举时 Follower 只认可日志不比自己旧的 Candidate 节点。</p><p>Snapshot：快照，把日志压缩成快照以更高效地利用存储。</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="680" width="520" height="290" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 60px; margin-left: 361px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 361px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 761px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 60px; margin-left: 761px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 436px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: 1. RAFT 任意节点都要有所有节点的地址配置用于发起投票（vote）
2. 每个节点启动后都会有个随机的延迟时间，在此时间内，如果其他节点抢先变成 Candidate 并发出 RequestVote 来到该节点要票（根据判定条件决定），给票了那么该节点就不会转变成 Candidate 。反之没有其他节点发出的 RequestVote 通过则该节点变成 Candidate 并向配置里的所有节点发 RequestVote 要票。
3. 当某个 Candidate 得到过半的选票后会直接宣布自己当选并向其他节点发送 AppendEntries ，此时如果 Candidate 如果收到 AppendEntries 就会转变成 Follower 而停止选举。
4. 当集群是偶数个节点，且节点被2个Candidate均分时会导致都不能获取过半投票而重新发起选举。或者更糟糕的情况，出现多个 Candidate 并都不能获取过半票数也是要重新发起选举。

switch.text: 初始1. RAFT 任意节点都要有所有节点的地址配置用于发起投票（vote）...

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 225px; margin-left: 601px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 36px; margin-left: 610px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 53px; margin-left: 621px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 447px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 236px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: 1. Candidate 的日志必须不比 Follower 旧。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 518px; height: 1px; padding-top: 527px; margin-left: 362px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 286px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: Candidate: 候选人，选举阶段的候选节点。
RequestVote RPC: Candidate 向其他节点发送要票的请求。
AppendEntries RPC: Leader 向其他节点发送的心跳，超时就会被 Follower 认为失职而进入投票阶段。
Term：任期，每次从投票开始到选出 Leader 并在 Leader 不能正常工作前的整个时期。
Log: 日志，数据同步依靠传递日志，选举时 Follower 只认可日志不比自己旧的 Candidate 节点。
Snapshot：快照，把日志压缩成快照以更高效地利用存储。

switch.text: 术语Leader: 主节点，可以读写。...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
